abstract: The rock scene in Taiwan is beginning to produce interesting music. And three of that country's rock music progenitors shared a stage at CMJ Music Marathon in the East Village on Wednesday.
snippet: The rock scene in Taiwan is beginning to produce interesting music. And three of that country's rock music progenitors shared a stage at CMJ Music Marathon in the East Village on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Three celebrated rock bands from Taiwan played in New York City for the first time on Wednesday night as part of the CMJ Music Marathon. Rock music, which was almost unheard of in Taiwan before 1987, has gained in popularity in the last 15 years as a generation of musicians who came of age under a more democratic government have looked to British and American bands, from Metallica to Radiohead, for inspiration.

headline.main: At CMJ, Taiwan Rocks the East Village
